title: Did Tanya McDowell get five years to send her son to a better school while Felicity Hoffman got 14 days?
subtitle: The memes comparing Tanya McDowell to the various criminal cases related to the school appear frequently.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Did Tanya McDowell get five years in prison to send her son to a better school, while Felicity Hoffman got 14 days in prison to pay her off?
